text: Hot Shots! is a 1991 American comedy film directed by Jim Abrahams, co-writer and co-director of Airplane!, and written by Abrahams and Pat Proft. It stars Charlie Sheen, Cary Elwes, Valeria Golino, Lloyd Bridges, Jon Cryer, Kevin Dunn, Kristy Swanson, and Bill Irwin. The film is primarily a parody of Top Gun, with some scenes spoofing other popular films, including 9Â½ Weeks, The Fabulous Baker Boys, Dances with Wolves, Marathon Man, Rocky, Superman, and Gone with the Wind. A sequel, Hot Shots! Part Deux, was released in 1993, with Sheen, Golino, Bridges and Haleva reprising their roles. ==Other websites== * * * * Category:1991 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American parody movies Category:Movies directed by Jim Abrahams Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Iraq Category:Movies about the United States Armed Forces Category:Movies about the United States Air Force Category:Movies about the United States Navy
title: Hot Shots!
